content:
We can search by a chained parameter in fhir, for example
get /fhir/Task?requester:PractitionerRole.practitioner:Practitioner.name=test
But I want to know if I can sort by Task?_sort=requester:PractitionerRole.practitioner:Practitioner.name.
No, chained sort parameters are not supported
There is no actual reason to "not support" - if you really need it - create an issue :)
We also now facing this issue, would be awesome to be able to sort something like this: {{baseurl}}/Task?_sort=patient.name
it's kinda hard from a server perspective
